    Ollie Chick, Samuel Pell

        amountSpent - amount the user spends
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if you try to spend a negative amount

      • calculateScore

        public void calculateScore()
        Calculate's the player's score. This is based on each pet the player has, so should be run each day.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Player otherPlayer)
        Compares this player with another to determine which of them has the higher score. Returns 1 if the other player has a higher score Returns 0 if the other player has the same score Returns -1 if the other player has a lower score
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Player>
        Parameters:
        otherPlayer - player to compare to this player
        Returns:
        whether the player has a higher or lower score
